thread.title: What a wonderful place to stay
thread.title_full: What a wonderful place to stay - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: suzta2017
title: What a wonderful place to stay
text:
From the moment I arrived everything was perfect; Valet parking was real bonus. Reception was vary helpful and my room very comfortable and well appointed - loved being able to choose my pillows! I ate a really excellent meal in the restaurant and had breakfast in the bright and airy dining room.
Its becoming my favorite place to stay in London
Room Tip: I asked for a quieter room and was assigned one in a quiet area - but to be fair its not a noisy hot... See more room tips
